name: jostling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of knocking or pushing roughly against someone in order to move past them or get more space when you are in a crowd of people: There was a lot of jostling among photographers for the perfect spot.
the act of competing with other people in order to get what you want: the current jostling for position in the government See
jostle
More examplesFewer examplesThe jostling for front row seats in St Peter's Square will be intense for the Pope's visit.The crisis brought the political jostling of the previous three years to a climax.In the initial jostling to be host city, New Orleans seemed to be the favourite.Behind the scenes, the jostling has begun.
